name: Turbo Truck City Crash 3D
description:
Step on the gas and race your truck off road or in the city. Dominate the streets and sky in Turbo Truck Racing 3D, an awesome blend of high-octane driving and off road racing. Turbo Truck City Crash is soon to become the #1 arcade racing game with stunning 3D graphics. Packed with ultra realistic sounds and driving physics. Accomplish the objective before time expires to advance to the next mission.
This is Turbo Truck City Crash 3D. It includes racing in the city streets and countryside roads. Features amazing vehicles, addictive gameplay and intense competition. Barrel through packed streets, crash into everything, smash into traffic, and perform dynamic, high-speed aerial stunts! The game will challenge even the most skilled racing fans.
Game Highlights:
- Super visuals and amazing 3D trucks
- One touch game play for hours of driving fun
- 4 Action packed levels with 32 Missions
- 2 Vehicles to choose from
